means: 短诗（尤指祈祷时牧师领读或领唱的）

sentence.Network_en: It hath great power against poverty, if thou considerest it with devotion, repeating the versicle.
sentence.Network_cn: 这有着巨大的力量对抗贫困, 如果你带着奉献考虑它, 复诵短诗.

PerfectNetExp.abs: versemonger 拙劣诗人versicle 短诗versicolor 杂色的
..." 这用作保护抵抗所有俗世的危险，通过每一天虔诚对它和复诵环绕着它的短诗。“因而你将永远不会灭亡。”5. versicle n. 短诗, 唱和的短句更多

list.abs: 5.精囊腺(Seminal versicles)：位于膀胱后方，左右各一，分泌带蛋白质的液体，能刺激精子移动，前名为贮精囊，被误为贮精的地方 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French versicule or Latin versiculus, diminutive of versus (see verse)

means.word_mean: 1. a short verse said or sung by a priest or minister in public worship and followed by a response from the congregation
